channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Self-invoking code benchmarks help you decide which LLMs to use for your programming tasks
item.description: LLMs are good at coding simple functions. But how good are they at calling their own functions to solve complex problems?
